title: Very rapid file changes can result in sync conflicts

labels.name: bug
labels.description: A problem with current functionality, as opposed to missing functionality (enhancement)

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

body:
As reported in https://forum.syncthing.net/t/since-0-14-lots-of-sync-conflict-files-appearing/7853/13

Smoking gun from own testing on FreeBSD, in this case for a file `myfile.tmp that changes multiple times per second. Logs from the pulling side, where no local changes are ever performed.

We can see it pull a block, resulting in a file size of 524288+93130 = 617418 (it's the last block).

```
[MRIW7] 2016/07/25 17:59:21.572598 sharedpullerstate.go:251: DEBUG: sharedPullerState default myfile pullNeeded start -> 1
[MRIW7] 2016/07/25 17:59:21.572757 model.go:1401: DEBUG: model@0xc820082000 REQ(out): I6KAH76-66SLLLB-5PFXSOA-UFJCDZC-YAOMLEK-CP2GB32-BV5RQST-3PSROAU: "de
fault" / "myfile" o=524288 s=93130 h=09fea3d574c59f0783d8378b30c24532e1ab4bec90fcb50cf5b51c381bb0bc7f ft=false
[MRIW7] 2016/07/25 17:59:21.577108 sharedpullerstate.go:261: DEBUG: sharedPullerState default myfile pullNeeded done -> 0
```

It's committed to the database because we send an index update about it:

```
[MRIW7] 2016/07/25 17:59:21.578400 model.go:1309: DEBUG: sendIndexes for I6KAH76-66SLLLB-5PFXSOA-UFJCDZC-YAOMLEK-CP2GB32-BV5RQST-3PSROAU-127.0.0.1:55864-1
27.0.0.1:22001 (TCP (Client))/"default": 1 files (last batch)
```

We then get a new index update and want to pull the file, but:

```
[MRIW7] 2016/07/25 17:59:33.431777 rwfolder.go:433: DEBUG: rwFolder/default@0xc820083900 handling myfile.tmp
[MRIW7] 2016/07/25 17:59:33.431994 blockqueue.go:45: DEBUG: open: open /home/jb/src/github.com/syncthing/syncthing/test/s2/.syncthing.myfile.tmp.tmp: no such file or directory
[MRIW7] 2016/07/25 17:59:33.432047 rwfolder.go:1021: DEBUG: rwFolder/default@0xc820083900 need file myfile.tmp; copy 6, reused []
[MRIW7] 2016/07/25 17:59:33.432156 rwfolder.go:922: DEBUG: file modified but not rescanned; not pulling: /home/jb/src/github.com/syncthing/syncthing/test/s2/myfile
[MRIW7] 2016/07/25 17:59:33.432264 rwfolder.go:923: DEBUG: File{Name:"myfile", Type:FILE, LocalVersion:87, Permissions:0644, Modified:1469462361, Version:{[{I6KAH76 39} {MRIW7OK 2}]}, Length:617382, Deleted:false, Invalid:false, NoPermissions:false, Blocks:[Block{0/131072/e236b8b494d32b28ffe8cc9fa9f1561d58701a08096e5df98c97c64001b106dd} Block{131072/131072/0247ad640c40ab8f7760700453625cc35d19bbed8f19ac45b0c4d63ac16c5c65} Block{262144/131072/b20cd4de8caca4120e46be81965071f05eb59d1787ba4824b0e802e63d23d176} Block{393216/131072/25112ccb764660963738bc1c223104783d239b9f4ceb7ebf9b6964f06a1f30b3} Block{524288/93130/09fea3d574c59f0783d8378b30c24532e1ab4bec90fcb50cf5b51c381bb0bc7f}]}
[MRIW7] 2016/07/25 17:59:33.432290 rwfolder.go:924: DEBUG: &{myfile 617418 420 {63605059161 0 0x12ac640} {280685751 15180 33188 1 502 20 4294967295 {1469462361 0} {1469462361 0} {1469462361 576872635} 617418 241 131072 2048 0 0 {1469462361 548873116}}}
```

The mismatch is that the database claims the file ought to be 617382 bytes, but it's actually 617418 on disk. What happened, did we forget a database update? Manage to get a cached entry from before the index update? Weird stuff.
